text: Trebelno pri Palovčah () is a small settlement, little more than a group of three dispersed farmsteads, in the hills east of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. ==Name== The name of the settlement was changed from Trebelno to Trebelno pri Palovčah in 1952.Spremembe naselij 1948–95. 1996. Database. Ljubljana: Geografski inštitut ZRC SAZU, DZS. ==References== ==External links== *Trebelno pri Palovčah at Geopedia * Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Trebelno pri Palovčah
